item.title: How to Make an Image's Background Transparent?
item.description: Learn how to use ImageMagick to adjust an image's background
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: The case of HEIF
item.description: Since Apple released iOS 11, HEIF replaced JPEG. Let's learn a bit more about this successor!
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Stupid Questions #1: Base64 Encoding
item.description: A very short introduction to Base64 Encoding
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Netflix's VMAF in a Travis CI Pipeline With Docker
item.description: A shrinked version of Netflix's VMAF Docker image to run easily in your CI pipeline
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Know the Size of an Ubuntu Package Prior to Downloading It
item.description: Have you ever wanted to know the amount of data which will be downloaded when you install a package with apt-get?
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Introduction to py.test
item.description: py.test is one of the most famous testing package in Python, with limitless configuration options and plenty of plugins to cover all situations.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Save Facebook Articles to Pocket
item.description: A simple Workflow to add articles found on Facebook to Pocket.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Introduction to Travis CI
item.description: Travis CI provides perfect integration with GitHub and Slack to provide free continuous integration for many languages.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Introduction to PyAudio
item.description: PyAudio provides bindings for the famous C library PortAudio and allows playing and recording audio in realtime with Python.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: MPEG-H Audio: Fitting Every Device
item.description: While "linear" or traditionnal TV is getting stuck because of the expanding variety of media (such as TV, computers, tablets or phones) and new means of consumption, MPEG-H has been defined to be flexible; this is especially true when talking about the audio part of MPEG-H.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: How Is Swift Changing the Way We Learn Programming?
item.description: Swift, the new programming language introduced by Apple eight months ago and which already reached the 25th rank of the most used languages list according to TIOBE’s index, might be more important than expected for worldwide developer’s community.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck

item.title: Multichannel Mobile Listening: A State Of The Art
item.description: Nowadays, the multiplication of audiovisual contents media such as computers, tablets and smartphones has created a major change in our behavior of content consumption. Broadcasting companies have to adapt their contents to fit our habits.
item.dc:creator: Jean Cruypenynck
